general.gigTitle: design and develop awesome responsive wordpress website

sellerCard.oneLiner: Your Solution for Website Design and Development WordPress and Laravel
sellerCard.description:
Hi There, We are Akmanda Media. We are agency with specialties in Website Design, WordPress, Laravel and Cloud Architecture.

In our career, These are some that we achieve 

- Create more than 60 premium WordPress products (Themes & Plugins) under name Themes Awesome and sold those in Themeforest - Codecanyon. 12.000+ websites around the world now use those products.
- Create Simak Online a champion in the 2019 Tech in Asia Conference.
- Create 10+ SAAS WebApps
- 500+ Client with 1500+ Succesful Projects

Please don't hesitate to contact Us to discuss Your Job

description.content:
Hi,


I'm here to help You to design and develop a stunning WordPress website specifically for you.


I've created 40+ Premium WordPress products (themes & plugins) under the brand Themes Awesome and selling those products in Themeforest and Codecanyon.


You can be sure about my WordPress programming expertise because I have created Premium WordPress Products of very high quality. Other than that, I am pro verified by Fiverr.


Please contact me to discuss Your project.


What's Included in this Gig :


  • Stunning Website design.
  • A full WordPress website that easy to update.
  • Pixel perfect.
  • Custom functionality (Premium Package).


Workflow

  1. Contact me to discuss all the details of Your project to ensure we're a good fit.
  2. I will design, send it to You for approval
  3. I will develop the design and make it live on my test server.
  4. I will give you the live URL of the project so you can check it.
  5. You can provide feedback on the live preview.
  6. After development is finalized, I migrate the website to Your server.


Please contact me to discuss Your project.

questionsAndAnswers.question: What information You need to start?
questionsAndAnswers.answer:
- Logo
- Brand Style guide (if Any), 
- 2-3 Websites that You like
- Content
- Images
-

questionsAndAnswers.question: What if I don't have a content?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: No worries! I can set up the site with dummy data which you can easily update later.

questionsAndAnswers.question: Will it be easy to add content?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: I will build it with ACF pro or Elementor. I will make sure that you can edit the content on Your website as easily as possible.

questionsAndAnswers.question: Will the website be responsive?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Of Course. I will make sure it is compatible with mobile devices

questionsAndAnswers.question: What's Your Background?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: I've created 40+ Premium WordPress products (WordPress themes & plugins) under the brand Themes Awesome and selling those products in Themeforest and Codecanyon. You can be sure about my WordPress programming expertise because I have created Premium WordPress Products of very high quality.

questionsAndAnswers.question: What is a Pro Gig?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: I am verified Pro on Fiverr. You can feel confident that I am a qualified person.

milestones.title: Delivery
milestones.description: I'll send you the final delivery for review and feedback.

steps.title: Website Spec
steps.description: I'll write specifications for your website, including all pages and features.

steps.title: Design concept
steps.description: I'll design a concept for your website, which we can then develop together.

steps.title: Final design
steps.description: I'll deliver the final design of your website for your approval.

steps.title: Development
steps.description: I'll develop a fully operative website for you.

steps.title: Content upload
steps.description: I'll upload your content (ex. text, images, videos, and more) to your website.

steps.title: Final Review
steps.description: I'll deliver the final version of the website for your review.

reviews.comment: Working with Akmanda Media was an absolute pleasure! Their attention to detail and professionalism in website development exceeded all expectations. Their proactive communication and deep understanding made the collaboration smooth and effective. Highly recommended!
I enjoyed working with the seller. The attention to detail is amazing. Quick response
Thank you , I will work with you again
Rizki was easy to work with and delivered a great product. We needed to extend the deliveries for some projects, but he was quick to let me know, and revisions were easy to work with.

He was responsive and made revisions when asked. I appreciate his helpfulness with the issues I was having in terms of making changes in the future with Wordpress. The design was clean, beautiful, and coherent.

reviews_snippet.comment:
This is the best quality that you can get if you would like to have a Wordpress website. Creative, fast, good quality and fun to work with.

5star ++
Seller is attentive and willing to adjust everything to meet my demands. He is a pro and knowledgeable in WP themes. Would recommend him to anyone.

Rizkiakmanda and staff are truly pros in the design and development of Wordpress website. They were very patient with our changes and executed revisions seamlessly. Ultimately, this was by far the best experience we have had on Fiver and we will be using Rizkiakmanda for a related project shortly. If you are looking for the best Wordpress developer on Fiver, Rizkiakmanda is your man! Thanks again for all of your hardworking throughout the project!!!

Expectations and hopes were very high
Expectations were met and exceeded
Professional work, good communication and revisions were minimal but addressed immediately 
Will work with him again, if he will work with me again in the future
